1122260.name: Music Maker 2020 Premium Steam Edition
1122260.description:
Make music the easy way

Simply make music: Music Maker 2020 Premium Steam Edition enables you to easily produce your own music for your gaming or video soundtracks and achieve impressive, professional-level sound. Combine sounds and loops, play melodies with virtual instruments, record vocals and rap and drag & drop to apply effects. With the customizable user interface, you can design Music Maker exactly the way you want.

More options than ever before

Music Maker 2020 Premium Steam Edition delivers even more options for easily producing your own music and achieving amazing sound. Access a massive range of sounds and loops from all genres, plus virtual instruments, functions and effects for your songs and gaming and video soundtracks – and you can select all the content you want to use directly via the in-app Store. Music Maker 2020 Premium Steam Edition also includes 5 mastering effects and 3 delay effects from the new coreFX bundles as well as the Ozone 8 Elements mastering plug-in by industry specialists iZotope – for the ultimate professional touch and adding the final touches to your tracks.

Music Maker 2020 Premium Steam Edition:

  • Select 1 Soundpool Collection, 3 bonus Soundpools & 8 instruments of your choice
  • Includes 9 feature packs (6 freely selectable)
  • Easy drag & drop music production
  • Included: 2 coreFX bundles with 5 mastering effects & 3 delay effects
  • Included: iZotope Ozone 8 Elements mastering plug-in
  • Even more Soundpools, features & instruments: The in-app Music Maker Store
  • Stay up-to-date: A lifetime of free updates
1122260.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 瑞典语
